events.name: WOWZAPP 2012: Worldwide Hackathon for Windows -- Jakarta, Indonesia
events.about:
Be part of the app revolution!

By registering, you’ll be joining thousands of developers worldwide as we build apps for the next generation of Windows.

Expert Help, Free Resources

Microsoft app experts, developers and trainers will be available on-site to assist your learning and coding. Learn about building Windows Store apps today – download the info, tools and resources you need now. 

Windows Azure Mobile Services

Does your Store app idea include cloud services or storage? Check out Get started withMobile Services –registered student WOWZAPP 2012 participants are eligible for a FREE temporary student Windows Azure subscription!– supplies are limited so be sure to register now!
events.address: Indonesia Stock Exchange Building, Tower 2, 18th Floor Jl. Jend. Sudirman Kav 52-53

events.name: Hackathon@ Startup Asia Jakarta
events.about:
Hackathon

  • Hackathon Location: 12th Floor, Annex Building, Wisma Nusantara Complex, Jl. M.H. Thamrin No. 59 Jakarta 10350, Indonesia (Annex Building behind Hotel Pullman)
  • Date & Time: Starts Thursday, June 7, 2012 at 1.00pm, ends Friday, June 8, 2012, at 2.00pm.
  • What it is: Double-fist Red Bull and coffee while you hack a totally brand new Android app in 24 hours with your team. To add to the fun, we have a bundle of APIs for you to hack with, ranging from server, social and location, and monetization APIs.
  • Why you should participate: Meet new developers, explore new APIs, and put your hacking skills to test against other developers from around Asia. Plus, you can win some cool prizes!
events.address: Kompleks Wisma Nusantara, Jl. M.H. Thamrin No. 59

events.name: Startup Asia Jakarta 2012
events.about:
Startup Asia Jakarta is a 2-day conference held in central Jakarta, Indonesia. There are 5 key highlights:


June 6, 2012 (Wed)

(1) Founders & Investors Meetup: A networking session that forms the bridge between entrepreneurs and investors.


June 7 - 8, 2012 (Thu & Fri)

(2) Startup Arena: A pitching competition for startups across Asia. The grand prize is US$10,000. 

(3) Coffee chats and discussion panels: A series of on-stage interviews and panels with industy leaders.

(4) Startup Gallery: An exhibition which showcases more 100+ startups across Asia.

(5) Hackathon: A 30-hour hackathon for mobile hackers across Asia to compete for prizes and geek honor.
events.address: Kompleks Wisma Nusantara, Jl. M.H. Thamrin No. 59

events.name: Startup Asia Jakarta 2012 (Bahasa Indonesia)
events.about:
Event Details
Startup Asia Jakarta adalah konferensi yang berlangsung selama 2 hari yang diadakan di Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. Ada 5 hal yang menjadi inti dari konferensi ini:

6 Juni 2012 (Rabu):
(1) Founders and Investors meetup

Sesi networking yang menjembatani diantara entrepreneurs  dan investors.


7 Juni 2012 (Kamis):
(2) Startup Arena

Kompetisi pitching untuk startups di Asia. Dengan hadiah utama sebesar 10 Ribu Dolar Amerika atau 90 Juta Rupiah.

(3) Coffee chats and discussion panels

Wawancara yang dilakukan di panggung dengan founders, entrepreneurs, investors dan pembicara-pembicara lainnya yang menarik dan juga panel yang memperlihatkan diskusi diantara para pemimpin industri.

(4) Hackathon

Acara ini akan berlangsung terus-menerus selama 30 jam untuk para developer mobile di seluruh Asia untuk bersaing mendapatkan hadiah dan kebanggaan sebagai geek terhebat.
events.address: Kompleks Wisma Nusantara, Jl. M.H. Thamrin No. 59
